pr_title: Deflake LifecycleTest, KernelTest, close ExecutorServices in the Context on shutdown

timeline.message: Deflake LifecycleTest, close ExecutorServices in the Context on shutdown

timeline.bodyText: We should prevent EvergreenService from accessing this method.
timeline.author: ShirleyZheng92

replies.bodyText: We can't do that and also unit test it in this way. I think we just need to enforce it through PRs. I'll add a big javadoc comment to it at least.
replies.author: MikeDombo
